original_text: King Zedekiah then gave orders for Jeremiah to be placed in the courtyard of the guard and given a loaf of bread from the street of the bakers each day until all the bread in the city was gone. So Jeremiah remained in the courtyard of the guard.
korean_text: 이에 시드기야 왕이 명령하여 예레미야를 감옥 뜰에 두고 떡 만드는 자의 거리에서 매일 떡 한 개씩 그에게 주게 하매 성중에 떡이 떨어질 때까지 이르니라 예레미야가 감옥 뜰에 머무니라

sentences.original_text: for Jeremiah to be placed in the courtyard of the guard
and given a loaf of bread from the street of the bakers each day
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 매일 떡 만드는 자의 거리에서 빵 한 덩이를 받도록

sentences.original_text: until all the bread in the city was gone
sentences.korean_translation: 성 안의 모든 빵이 없어질 때까지

sentences.original_text: So Jeremiah remained in the courtyard of the guard
